pages.text: Affiliation is a hidden aspect. It is assigned to anything that interacts with Great Old Ones, and is divided into $(marked)inherent$() and $(marked)apparent$() affiliation.$(br2)$(marked)Inherent$() affiliation is gained through ascension - for originally normal humans at least. It is relevant for certain $(ml:rites/rite_intro)rites$() and in further ascension.

$(marked)Apparent$() affiliation commonly matches inherent affiliation. It is irrelevant for most occult practice, but does play a role when interacting among other Entheators or affiliated entities. The apparent affiliation can be covered or changed using $(item)masks$().
pages.text2: These masks are usually worn by and acquired from other practitioners representing their Great Old One.
